contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHNY-FM | image = | city = [[Irapuato, Guanajuato]], [[Mexico]] | area = [[Guanajuato]] | branding = Exa FM | slogan = Sobre Todas Las Cosas Â¡Ponte Exa! | airdate = | frequency = 93.5 ([[megahertz|MHz]]) | format = [[Contemporary hit radio|Spanish & English Top 40 (CHR)]] | power = | erp = 30,030 [[watt]]s | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = [[MVS Radio]] | webcast = | website = http://www.exafm.com/irapuato/ | affiliations = }} '''XHNY-FM''' is an Exa FM formatted [[Contemporary hit radio|Spanish & English Top 40 (CHR)]] music radio station that serves the state of [[Guanajuato]]. It is owned by [[MVS Radio]]. <br clear=all> {{Guanajuato Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Guanajuato]]
